item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Standard Product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Standard Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click “New product” Page New product will open Fill the following fields > Enable product > Click Save Message Settings updated. appears Click “Preview” New page will open with newly created product Disable product by unchecking Offline option > Save > Click Preview Message Settings updated.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Pack Product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Pack Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click Add new products > Choose pack of products > Enter a name > Add quantity > Add price * Message “Unable to update settings”. appears * Message “This pack is empty. You must add at least one product item.” appears under the title Add a simple product to the pack > Add a virtual product + increase quantity > Add customizable product > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Virtual Product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Add Virtual Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click Add new product > Choose Virtual Product > Enter name + price + quantity > Click Save Message Settings updated. appears Click Offline to uncheck it Product is now Online In tab Virtual > Add a downloadable file (png, jpg or other) > Choose file > Add filename > Add Number of allowed downloads > Add Expiration Date > Add number of days > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Edit Product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Edit Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products > Click on the Pen of an existing product Edit product page opens in tab Basic Settings In Basic Settings Edit name of product - reference - price - images - description > Click Save Info updated Message Settings updated. appears Add Feature > Pre-defined value > Save Message Settings updated.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Preview Product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Preview Product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = total products Filter products by Name Number of products < Total products All products name contains the Searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Preview The FO > Products details page is displayed and the product name = searched name Click on product of your choice > Click on button Preview Product page will open in another tab Close the current tab The BO > Catalog > Products page is well displayed Reset all filters Number of products = total products

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Duplicate Product from list
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Duplicate Product from list Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all Filters Number of products = Total of products Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Duplicate An alert “Product successfully duplicated.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Delete product
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Delete product Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Products page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = Total of products Filter Products by Name Number of products < Total of products All the products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle, click on “Delete” and confirm the deletion An alert “Product successfully deleted.

item.title: BO - Catalog - Products - Enable & Disable
item.description: BO - Catalog - Products - Enable & Disable Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products The Product list page is displayed Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contain the searched Name Click on the switch toggle and click on Disable An alert “Product successfully deactivated.” is displayed and the product is disabled Click on the switch toggle and click on Enable An alert “Product successfully activated.
